dmca.title: [EV1-C1838489U] Copyright Infringement - just4games.net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs, 
 
www.just4games.net appears to be hosting with you. 
 
This company was a client of www.spong.com and they use our computer
games data on their site. 
 
They have gone out of business but they still are presenting our data on
your servers. 
 
This is an infringement of our copyrighted materials. 
 
Can you take a look at this for us? The content must be removed from
their online store. 
 
Regards, 
 
Phil Atkinson
VP Sales
----------------
SPOnG.com ltd
Wakefield Media Centre
19 King Street
Wakefield
WF1 2SQ 
 
E: phil@spong.com
T: +44 8456 441 607
F: +44 1924 204 401
M: +44 777 618 1633 
 
www.spong.com
www.eleventeenth.com 
www.extware.com
